p: The scientific databases, Web of Knowledge, Medline/PubMed, Scopus, and Google Scholar were searched to find studies on anti-inflammatory, antioxidants and immunomodulatory effects of A. cepa and its main constituents, published from 1996 until the end of July 2020. The following key words were used: ‘ Allium cepa’, ‘onion’, ‘flavonoid’, ‘quercetin’, ‘organosulfur’, ‘saponin’, ‘phenolic compounds’, ‘anti-inflammatory’, ‘antioxidant’ and ‘immunomodulatory’.
